definitions.definition: Constituting or relating to the average.
examples: The average age of the participants was 18.5.

definitions.definition: Neither very good nor very bad; rated somewhere in the middle of all others in the same category.
examples: I soon found I was only an average chess player.
The average family will not need the more expensive features of this product.

definitions.definition: Not outstanding , not good , banal ; bad or poor .

main_definition: ( not comparable ) Constituting or relating to the average.
secondary_definitions: Neither very good nor very bad; rated somewhere in the middle of all others in the same category.
( informal ) Not outstanding , not good , banal ; bad or poor .
